probability_assessment.your_adjusted_view: No adjustments needed; the probabilities align with current market sentiment.

reasoning: Given the negative expected value and poor risk-reward ratio, it is prudent to avoid any position in QQQ at this time. The current market conditions and synthesis failure further support this cautious approach.
vs_research_manager: While the research manager recommends holding, I believe the metrics indicate a stronger case for avoiding any investment due to negative expected returns and unfavorable risk-reward dynamics.
